showScoreExcerpt:
"It is fascinating and at times uncomfortable. Unfortunately, the nearly two-hour story McBurney tells goes on too long. After a while, you just want your freedom back...The time and effort required to write and produce this play are to be applauded. McBurney put his heart and soul into this work, and it shows on stage...'The Encounter' fails to deliver. Technology is a wonderful thing, but immersing the audience into this wall of sound is not great theater."
